Description:
Required Skills to be Successful:1.- Knowledge of service management operation.2.- Supervisory experience.3.- Workshop automotive dealership experience. 4.- Analytical skills.What equips you for the role:Diploma or Bachelor of Automobile /Mechanical Engineering.
5 to 8 years overall experience with the automotive dealership – out of which a minimum 3 years in Service Department at managerial role.
Valid Oman driver’s license.
Proficient in Microsoft Office and ERP skills.
Proficient in English.Job Details
